CancelDataRepositoryTask.name: CancelDataRepositoryTask
CancelDataRepositoryTask.description: This action cancels a data repository task

CreateBackup.name: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.description: This action creates a new backup.

CreateDataRepositoryTask.name: CreateDataRepositoryTask
CreateDataRepositoryTask.description: This action creates a new task.

CreateFileSystem.name: CreateFileSystem
CreateFileSystem.description: This action creates a new, empty, Amazon FSx file system

CreateFileSystemFromBackup.name: CreateFileSystemFromBackup
CreateFileSystemFromBackup.description: This action creates a new Amazon FSx file system from an existing backup.

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description:
This action deletes a backup, deleting its contents. After deletion, the backup no
                                                longer exists, and its data is gone.

DeleteFileSystem.name: DeleteFileSystem
DeleteFileSystem.description: This action deletes a file system, deleting its contents.

DescribeBackups.name: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.description:
This action returns the description of specific Amazon FSx backups, if one or more
                                                BackupIds are provided for that backup. Otherwise, it returns all backups owned by
                                                your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling.

DescribeDataRepositoryTasks.name: DescribeDataRepositoryTasks
DescribeDataRepositoryTasks.description:
This action returns the description of specific Amazon FSx data repository task, if
                                                one or more TaskIds are provided for that data repository task. Otherwise, it returns
                                                all data repository task owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint
                                                that you're calling.

DescribeFileSystems.name: DescribeFileSystems
DescribeFileSystems.description:
This action returns the description of specific Amazon FSx file systems, if a FileSystemIds
                                                value is provided for that file system. Otherwise, it returns descriptions of all
                                                file systems owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're
                                                calling.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: This action lists tags for an Amazon FSx resource.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: This action tags an Amazon FSx resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: This action removes a tag from an Amazon FSx resource.

UpdateFileSystem.name: UpdateFileSystem
UpdateFileSystem.description: This action updates file system configuration.
